name: Items and Resulting Recipes
description: List of all items, and the recipes that use them

objects.name: Monkey
objects.description: This banana-loving acrobat is like if Tarzan had a caffeine addiction!

objects.name: Giraffe
objects.description: The long-necked, leafy buffet enthusiast that would make even a stepladder feel short.

objects.name: Bee
objects.description: The buzzing little cousin of Buzzie Lightyear, Defender of the Flora and Champion of Sweetness!

objects.name: Coin
objects.description: More valuable than a chest full of dragon's gold, this shiny round thing makes NPCs do your bidding.

objects.name: SWARM
objects.description: Unleash a tiny, buzzing army that makes you feel like the villain in a superhero movie.

objects.name: Hydra
objects.description: When one head isn't enough to argue with you, this multi-headed reptilian nightmare is ready to rumble!

objects.name: MonkeyBranch
objects.description: Swing through the jungle like Tarzan with this monkey-approved vine, perfect for dramatic escapes and awkward landings.

objects.name: Bridge
objects.description: The majestic road-over-nothing, perfect for trolls and billy goats alike.

objects.name: GoldenGate
objects.description: The mystical bridge that Gandalf would totally approve of, connecting realms and charging tolls in riddles.

objects.name: Gold
objects.description: Shinier than a disco ball at Studio 54, this glistening treasure will make Scrooge McDuck jealous!

objects.name: Silver
objects.description: Shinier than a vampire at a disco party, it's what werewolves dread and jewelry lovers adore.

objects.name: Rhodium
objects.description: The bling-bling metal of the periodic table: shinier than your future, harder than your math homework.

objects.name: Hive
objects.description: Welcome to the buzzfeed mansion, where every room has a bee-convincing argument!

objects.name: Transaction
objects.description: The magical moment when your gold coins vanish and you're left wondering if you've been pickpocketed by a ninja or just bought a shiny new sword.

objects.name: Block
objects.description: Like adult Legos, but less fun and more about stopping that lava from ruining your day!

objects.name: Blockchain
objects.description: The magical internet ledger of destiny that Satoshi dreamt up, where everything is transparent, immutable, and forever entwined like the plot of a Christopher Nolan movie.

objects.name: Polkadot
objects.description: Think Bitcoin's eccentric cousin who shows up at parties in a spotted suit and shocks everyone with their dazzlingly efficient dancing.

objects.name: PeerReview
objects.description: A scroll that makes your friends question their life choices and your enemies spit out their coffee in disbelief.

objects.name: Cardano
objects.description: Time to unleash the blockchain beast that's more confusing than an IKEA assembly manual!

objects.name: Bear
objects.description: This fuzzy giant decided to move out of the forest and into your nightmares on the advice of its therapist, Yogi.

objects.name: Beer
objects.description: The golden elixir of the gods, best enjoyed when your quest log is empty and your dance moves are questionable.

objects.name: Lock
objects.description: Who needs a dragon when you've got this security boss blocking your treasure chest?

objects.name: Marmalade
objects.description: The sticky, fruity concoction that Paddington Bear would trade his hat for.

objects.name: SuperMarmalade
objects.description: As if Spider-Man and your grandma's secret jam recipe had a citrusy baby that swings through breakfast toast saving your taste buds one bite at a time!

objects.name: HyperMarmalade
objects.description: Like regular marmalade, but it makes you feel like you've had a double shot of espresso and a lightning bolt to the brain!

objects.name: Water
objects.description: H2-Oh no, you spilled it again!

objects.name: Fire
objects.description: Summon a flickering tongue of destruction that makes dragons envious and marshmallows tremble in awe!

objects.name: Steam
objects.description: It's water's sassy teen phase before it cools down and becomes boring again.

objects.name: Earth
objects.description: Because who doesn't want a handful of dirt from Mother Nature's handbag?

objects.name: Mud
objects.description: Mother Nature's messy smoothie, perfect for impromptu spa days or sabotaging the hero's clean shoes!

objects.name: Lava
objects.description: Spicy earth salsa that guarantees an insta-tan and some crispy new shoes!

objects.name: Wind
objects.description: The invisible ninja that gives trees a good hair day.

objects.name: Dust
objects.description: The forgotten remains of battles long past, or your enemy when you forget to clean under the sofa.

objects.name: Rain
objects.description: Sky's attempt at a group shower: brings hydration and dramatic window views!

objects.name: Smoke
objects.description: As elusive as your New Year's resolutions, it vanishes faster than free Wi-Fi at a coffee shop.

objects.name: Geyser
objects.description: Mother Nature's boiling hot water cannon, now available as a decorative backyard feature!

objects.name: Clay
objects.description: Mold this earthy Play-Doh into something magical, or just make yourself a new best friend, Wilson style!

objects.name: Sand
objects.description: Pocketful of tiny wizards' teeth, creating beaches and cat litter archeology!

objects.name: Plant
objects.description: The botanical equivalent of Wi-Fi for oxygen, providing full bars since prehistoric times.

objects.name: Rainbow
objects.description: The sky's post-rain refurbishment job, brought to you by Mother Nature's favorite highlighter pack.

objects.name: Storm
objects.description: Angry sky kittens throwing tantrums and lightning bolts like Thor after a double espresso.

objects.name: Obsidian
objects.description: Crafted by the earth's angriest volcano, it's tougher than your grandma's fruitcake and twice as unforgiving.

objects.name: Ash
objects.description: The remains of your epic campfire story that burned out faster than your WiFi during a binge session.

objects.name: Volcano
objects.description: Mount Doom's flamboyant cousin who's always ready to throw a tantrum and belch fiery salsa.

objects.name: Sandstorm
objects.description: It's like Mother Nature's version of a blender set to 'desert' mode, without the fruity cocktail at the end.

objects.name: Cloud
objects.description: Fluffier than marshmallows and moodier than a teenager, this sky cotton candy hides the secrets of the weather gods.

objects.name: Fog
objects.description: It’s like someone took all the clouds, shredded them, and set them loose to play hide and seek with your vision.

objects.name: Tree
objects.description: The original WiFi router for squirrels, providing shade and nuts with zero bars of signal!

objects.name: Forest
objects.description: A dense collection of trees where even squirrels hire GPS, home of the mythical Wi-Fi-repellent green zone.

objects.name: Seeds
objects.description: Nature's popcorn kernels, just add dirt and patience for a flourishing snack!

objects.name: Pottery
objects.description: Perfect for storing all your grandma's secret cookie recipes and ancient legendary treasures, one chip at a time!

objects.name: Brick
objects.description: As indestructible as your WiFi on a good day, this brick could build a mansion or your Minecraft empire.

objects.name: Quicksand
objects.description: The Earth's way of saying 'GOTCHA!' when you thought a leisurely stroll through the desert sounded appealing.

objects.name: Glass
objects.description: As delicate as your ego after a bad break-up, but see-through like your best friend's terrible poker face.

objects.name: Dune
objects.description: Get ready to channel your inner Muad'Dib and rule the sandy seas while dodging giant worms and political plots!

objects.name: Charcoal
objects.description: The BBQ Master's secret ingredient for transforming your steaks from zero to hero faster than you can say 'Grill-Zilla!'

objects.name: Leaves
objects.description: Green confetti for Mother Nature's never-ending party, with a hint of chlorophyll chic!

objects.name: Wildfire
objects.description: Spicier than your ex's DMs, this blaze turns forests into toast and marshmallows into napalm.

objects.name: Jungle
objects.description: Like Tarzan's playground but with 99% more bugs and 100% less Wi-Fi.

objects.name: FrostedGlass
objects.description: Clearer than your intentions after a night out, but still elusive as your friend who promises to show up on time.

objects.name: Crystal
objects.description: Shiny as Edward Cullen and twice as sparkly in the moonlight!

objects.name: Magma
objects.description: Hotter than your ex's last text, this molten rock sauce will turn enemies into toast.

objects.name: Rock
objects.description: It's Dwayne Johnson's stony cousin, perfect for smashing enemies or just sitting there, being all geology-like.

objects.name: Shard
objects.description: This is the majestic piece of glitter, sharper than your ex-girlfriend's comebacks!

objects.name: Pebble
objects.description: As insignificant as the pebble you kicked on your way to saving the world.

objects.name: Mountain
objects.description: The colossal nature bump that's basically Earth's awkward zit.

objects.name: Fertilizer
objects.description: Sprinkle a little of this magic dust and watch your plants grow faster than a YouTube tutorial on 'getting rich quick!'

objects.name: Soot
objects.description: Dust bunnies' granddaddy who moonlights as a chimney sweep in a Dickens novel.

objects.name: Lightning
objects.description: Like Thor's tantrum in a bottle, ready to zap your foes into crispy critters!

objects.name: Mist
objects.description: Like a ghost doing the moonwalk, it slips through your fingers and cloaks the world in mystery!

objects.name: Haze
objects.description: Like Gandalf's vape party, but a lot less fun and way more confusing.

objects.name: Flood
objects.description: When Mother Nature throws the ultimate pool party and forgets to send the 'BYO life jacket' memo.

objects.name: Landslide
objects.description: A geological temper tantrum that sends boulders downhill faster than a caffeine-crazed squirrel on roller skates!

objects.name: Thunder
objects.description: Like Thor's mixtape at full volume, this electrifying zap will leave your enemies shocked and awed!

objects.name: Tornado
objects.description: Nature's blender on steroids, mixing up cows, houses, and your afternoon picnic.

objects.name: Garden
objects.description: Nature's sunlit Wi-Fi free zone, and the original farm-to-table restaurant!

objects.name: Ember
objects.description: Like a tiny dragon's sneeze, this little spark packs a fiery punch!

objects.name: Kiln
objects.description: The oven that turns your pottery dreams into reality, just like Hogwarts turns kids into wizards.

objects.name: Pollination
objects.description: Nature's Tinder for plants, where bees are the swiping right matchmakers.

objects.name: Sinkhole
objects.description: Suddenly feeling like you starred in a Looney Tunes cartoon, minus the anvil and roadrunner.

objects.name: Beach
objects.description: A sun-kissed playground where sand gets everywhere, like glitter but from hell.

objects.name: Wetstone
objects.description: Sharpen your blades while pondering life's mysteries with this slippery soapy rock, straight from the stones of Soapland!

objects.name: Erosion
objects.description: Nature's slow-motion magic trick, turning mighty mountains into beach sand one grain at a time.

objects.name: Basalt
objects.description: Forged in the depths of the earth, harder than your ex's heart and cooler than the underside of your pillow.

objects.name: MagmaChamber
objects.description: Hotter than a dragon's sneeze, this is the spicy jacuzzi of the underworld.

objects.name: Breeze
objects.description: Like Gandalf's whisper, this gentle wind will casually rearrange your bad hair day.

objects.name: WarmBreeze
objects.description: It's like Mother Nature left the hairdryer on; embrace the cozy winds of summer hugs!

objects.name: Soil
objects.description: Dirt-napped cousin of terra-firma, perfect for your eco-friendly carpet installations!

objects.name: Canyon
objects.description: Nature's gigantic frown; perfect for epic echoes and bottomless pratfalls.

objects.name: Windmill
objects.description: Spinning like your favorite DJ, this eco-friendly giant turns breezes into electrical symphonies.

objects.name: Adobe
objects.description: The ancient Minecraft enchantment that grants you the power to build desert dream homes with just a handful of dirt and some water!

objects.name: Wall
objects.description: The Gentleman Bouncer of your castle, politely informing intruders that the party's over.

objects.name: Pumice
objects.description: Floats like a butterfly, scrubs like Mr. Clean - the Swiss cheese of rocks!

objects.name: Barbecue
objects.description: Unleash your inner pitmaster with this meat sizzle maker, as seen on grill-enthusiast reality shows!

objects.name: Farm
objects.description: The ultimate pre-industrial protein shake factory, where plants and animals live in suspenseful harmony waiting to be useful.

objects.name: Shards
objects.description: Fragments of a broken heart? Or just pieces of yesterday's piñata—either way, they're sharp!

objects.name: MoltenGlass
objects.description: Hotter than a dragon's breath after Taco Tuesday, this molten glass can melt through your problems... literally.

objects.name: Prism
objects.description: Divide light like a 70's disco ball at a Saturday night fever party.

objects.name: Sparkle
objects.description: Glitter brighter than a unicorn's tears at a K-pop concert.

objects.name: Desert
objects.description: A vast sandbox of banishment where even cacti consider sunblock.

objects.name: Oasis
objects.description: The desert's VIP lounge, complete with complimentary palm trees and mirage-resistant seating!

objects.name: Mirage
objects.description: As elusive as your mom's Wi-Fi password and twice as frustrating to catch!

objects.name: SandDune
objects.description: As majestic as a stack of pancakes, but far more abrasive and less syrupy.

objects.name: Dam
objects.description: The Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson of water barriers, holding back the wet with sheer muscle.

objects.name: Firewall
objects.description: The Gandalf of cybersecurity: 'You shall not pass!'

objects.name: Barricade
objects.description: Like Gandalf facing a Balrog, it's the 'You shall not pass!' of fortifications.

objects.name: Plateau
objects.description: A flat piece of land that got tired of climbing mountains and decided to chill forever.

objects.name: Pond
objects.description: Where ducks hold their secret aquatic raves and lily pads plot world domination.

objects.name: Aromas
objects.description: Sprinkle a bit of Hogwarts' magic under your nose and breathe in the essence of enchanted forests and dragon's breath!

objects.name: Flower
objects.description: The colorful Wi-Fi signal for bees; smells better than your ex's perfume!

objects.name: Spore
objects.description: Tiny, invisible disco balls of doom, ready to throw a rave in your sinuses!

objects.name: Spread
objects.description: As versatile as a Swiss army knife, it's the social butterfly of condiments!

objects.name: FertileLand
objects.description: As luxurious and bountiful as Bob Ross’s paint palette, it's the MVP of Mother Nature's garden party.

objects.name: Wetland
objects.description: As if Mother Nature decided to recreate the set of Jumanji with extra humidity and a smorgasbord of mosquitoes!

objects.name: Peat
objects.description: It's like the cozy blanket of soil—excellent for plants, terrible for couch potatoes.

objects.name: Reeds
objects.description: The nature-made cocktail straws that just might call Gandalf from Middle-earth; beware of hobbits sneaking around!

objects.name: Valley
objects.description: The place where hills take a break and gossip about mountains.

objects.name: River
objects.description: The highway for fish and the misplaced bathtubs of nature, flowing with more twists than a soap opera plotline.

objects.name: ScorchedEarth
objects.description: More devastating than an expired hot sauce binge, it turns fertile land into a Mad Max wasteland!

objects.name: Delta
objects.description: The river’s final boss battle, where water splits like an indecisive rom-com character in the season finale.

objects.name: Estuary
objects.description: Where the river meets the sea, like the ultimate mashup album nobody asked for but everyone loves.

objects.name: FireSwamp
objects.description: Enter at your own risk and remember, the trees have a fiery personality akin to dragons after a spicy taco night!

objects.name: Riverbank
objects.description: Where Gandalf would come for a picnic with his hobbit homies if Middle-earth had longer vacations.

objects.name: Ravine
objects.description: The Grand Canyon's emo teenager cousin, endless depths of angsty chasms.

objects.name: Gorge
objects.description: When wandering through this natural wonder, remember: it's like Mother Earth's really dramatic cleavage.

objects.name: CharredRavine
objects.description: A spicy hot potato chip of doom, hotter than a dragon's sneeze in a volcano.

objects.name: Echo
objects.description: It's like shouting into a canyon, but the canyon actually cares about what you said and keeps repeating it back.

objects.name: Cave
objects.description: A dark, damp Airbnb for bats and trolls, with zero Wi-Fi signal but plenty of natural 'rockitecture'.

objects.name: UndergroundLake
objects.description: The Batcave of aquatic hideaways, home to timid fish and overly ambitious spelunkers alike.

objects.name: LavaCave
objects.description: A fiery Airbnb for fire-breathing dragons and grilled marshmallows.

objects.name: WhisperingCave
objects.description: A cave so chatty it makes high school gossip sound like monk's meditation.

objects.name: SubterraneanPool
objects.description: Where the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles learned to swim and rediscover lost rubber duckies!

objects.name: Spring
objects.description: Jump higher than your dreams, or at least higher than your disappointments, with this bouncy boing-boing.

objects.name: HotSpring
objects.description: Like soaking in a jacuzzi made by Mother Nature, but without the awkward vacation photos!

objects.name: Grotto
objects.description: The ultimate bachelor pad for goblins—think of it as a man cave, but with actual caves.

objects.name: Fountain
objects.description: Where wishes and coins go on a wild water slide together.

objects.name: SteamVent
objects.description: When regular air conditioning just won't cut it, unleash this spicy hot air geyser and channel your inner Old Faithful!

objects.name: CoolBreeze
objects.description: As refreshing as a surprise pizza party in summer, but with zero calories!

objects.name: Monument
objects.description: A stone tribute that's so towering, it could give the Statue of Liberty vertigo!

objects.name: Waterfall
objects.description: Niagara's younger, slightly less impressive cousin that still turns heads like a supermodel on a catwalk.

objects.name: EternalFlame
objects.description: Hotter than a dragon's sneeze, this flame burns with the angst of a thousand rejected pop stars!

objects.name: PillarOfWind
objects.description: A swirling cyclone of air that even the Weather Channel fears to forecast.

objects.name: Stream
objects.description: Like Netflix for fish, this babbling brook is constantly streaming new episodes of nature’s playlist!

objects.name: Zephyr
objects.description: A breeze so gentle, it could whisper lullabies to butterflies while moonwalking through daisies.

objects.name: Creek
objects.description: Tiny river, think of it as a baby Amazon just learning to meme.

objects.name: Brook
objects.description: Where baby rivers are born and sent to Hogwarts.

objects.name: Whisper
objects.description: The secret handshake of the wind and your ear, as if a gossiping fairy had a megaphone.

objects.name: Rivulet
objects.description: A tiny stream so small that even ants use it as their personal slip-n-slide.

objects.name: Tributary
objects.description: A glorified water delivery service, bringing aqua goodness to bigger, bossier rivers.

objects.name: Murmur
objects.description: Like the whisper of a ninja, Murmur is the sound your enemies will never hear until it’s too late.

objects.name: Watershed
objects.description: A pivotal plot twist in the landscape where water decides which way it wants to go for the grand finale!

objects.name: Aquifer
objects.description: Nature's secret underground swimming pool, perfect for when groundwater wants to chill out.

objects.name: ParchedEarth
objects.description: More thirst-quenching than a backstage pass at a Beyoncé concert!

objects.name: FreshBreeze
objects.description: A zephyr so crisp it could convince even Darth Vader to join a yoga retreat!

objects.name: Groundwater
objects.description: Mother Earth's secret stash, hidden beneath her rocky garments like a hip flask at a dry wedding.

objects.name: Reservoir
objects.description: Hoarder of H2O: Where all the local water droplets hang out and gossip about breaking dams and making waves!

objects.name: GeothermalSpring
objects.description: Mother Nature's jacuzzi, hotter than the coffee your soul relies on.

objects.name: ArtesianWell
objects.description: The bottomless mimosa bar of water sources, constantly refilling without you lifting a finger - cheers!

objects.name: Basin
objects.description: The Holy Grail of your bathroom, where soap bubbles dream of escape and rubber duckies rule!

objects.name: Lake
objects.description: Nature's giant puddle, perfect for lazy fish, and where mythical creatures might just throw tea parties.

objects.name: DryBasin
objects.description: A bowl so devoid of moisture, even SpongeBob would dry up in here.

objects.name: Depression
objects.description: Feeling like Eeyore in a world full of Tiggers.

objects.name: Island
objects.description: A chunk of land adrift in the ocean, like a slice of pizza floating in tomato soup.

objects.name: Lagoon
objects.description: A lazy lake who's too cool to hang with the ocean, featuring more zen than a yoga retreat for dolphins.

objects.name: Wave
objects.description: Surf's up, dude–ride this aquatic rollercoaster like a water wizard!

objects.name: Reef
objects.description: The underwater rock concert where fish party harder than rockstars!

objects.name: Coral
objects.description: Nature's underwater apartment complex—complete with quirky neighbors!

objects.name: Whirl
objects.description: Like a blender on steroids, this mini-maelstrom promises to mix up your enemies' day!

objects.name: Limestone
objects.description: The rock Dwayne Johnson wished he was named after - capable of building empires and perfect for caveman graffiti.

objects.name: Karst
objects.description: The Swiss cheese of landscapes—full of holes, surprises, and probably a hidden treasure if you look close enough!

objects.name: Quicklime
objects.description: Just add water and watch this rock go all 'Hulk Smash' on your hydration dreams!

objects.name: Blowhole
objects.description: The marine mammal's N64 controller button for an epic H2O power-up!
